metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10880 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
Linux kernel is vulnerable to a stack-out-of-bounds write in the ext4 filesystem code when mounting and writing to a crafted ext4 image in ext4_update_inline_data(). An attacker could use this to cause a system crash and a denial of service. Wen Xu discovered that the ext4 filesystem implementation in the Linux kernel did not properly ensure that xattr information remained in inode bodies. An attacker could use this to construct a malicious ext4 image that, when mounted, could cause a denial of service (system crash).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10880` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1034-aws - 4.4.0-1034.37
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1037-azure - 4.15.0-1037.39~14.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-139-generic - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-139-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-139-lowlatency - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-139-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-139-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-139-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-139-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-139-generic - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1037-azure - 4.15.0-1037.39~14.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-139-generic - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-139-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-139-lowlatency - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-139-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-139-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-139-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-139-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-139-generic - 4.4.0-139.165~14.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> possible reproducer in bug report note that it depends on the ext4 inline_data feature, which is not the default.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-aws package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1034.37').
linux-azure package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1037.39~14.04.2').
